title: Meet Me In The Sunflowers
description: Isabelle is at a crossroads in her life. Mourning the loss of her beloved grandfather, she feels like she's drowning, constantly being pulled under by never-ending waves of sadness and despair. On his birthday, she takes a trip to a sunflower field, honouring his last whispered words to her, 'meet me in the sunflowers.' While she doesn't meet her grandfather, she does meet Tyler. Surrounded by the beautiful flowers, they plan a sunflower road trip across Europe.From England to France. Spain to Italy. Isabelle embarks on a trip to honour her grandfather, the trip he'd always wanted to take.Along the way, she begins to find herself again. But when Tyler's past makes an appearance, can she stand tall like a sunflower? Or will she wilt without her newfound light?
author: Sophie Blue
